title: WBFSL Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 81 Scientific Assistant, Driver Posts
description: The West Bengal Forensic Science Laboratory (WBFSL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 81 Scientific Assistant, Scientific Officer, and Driver Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ 8th, B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech and Post-graduation students can apply for the WBFSL Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. H...
